subject: Re: Promotion redemption page
preview: Hi Bonnie,  Thank you for the confirmation.  The code is now removed.  Let us know if you have any further queries — happy to assist!

Hi Bonnie,

Thank you for the confirmation.

The code is now removed.

Let us know if you have any further queries — happy to assist!

Hi Joy,

There is no code so this can be removed.

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager

We appreciate your quick confirmation.

We have now successfully added "Promotions" to the footer.

Can you confirm if you have a code that we'll edit here? Or shall we remove these for now?

Thank you! This looks good.

Hi Bonnie,

Wanted to add that once you are happy with the page, we will proceed with adding it to the website footer.

Hi Bonnie,

We are happy to inform you that we have created the Promotions page.

👉Promotions page link
👉Here's a Loom guide on how to update the Promotions page.

Let us know if you have any feedback or further queries.

Hi Bonnie,

Absolutely. We can have this on dev queue next week.

Once it's ready, we’ll send over a link so you can review the page.

Hi Joy,

Are you able to create a landing page that house our promotions to help customers find our promotions if they don't have the URL? Here is an example website Smeg Promotions

I can keep this up to date as we close off and activate promotions. Can you please add a link to this page in the footer? We can call it 'Promotions'

Thanks

Bonnie Sudirwan

Marketing Communications Manager

We have successfully made the following updates to the form:

  1. Updated Address fields
  2. Added Upload field
  3. Added reCAPTCHA to the form

👉https://mayohardware.com.au/char-griller-redemption/
👉https://mayohardware.com.au/cozze-redemption/

Can you confirm if everything looks good on your end? Let us know if there’s anything else you need us to take care of.

Hi Joy,

Yes, please replace the "delivery details" section with this.

Can you please also confirm how customers can upload their proof of purchase (receipt)?

Hi Bonnie,

Appreciate your quick feedback.

Happy to make the requested updates. Before that, we'd like to confirm first that we will be replacing the Delivery Details to the address fields you have indicated.

Looking forward to your response.

Hi Joy, Can you please change the format of the address to have the below boxes
  • Address line 1 (mandatory)
  • Address line 2 (optional)
  • Suburb (mandatory)
  • State (mandatory)
  • Postcode (mandatory)
Please also add a note stating that PO Boxes are not accepted. Hi Bonnie,

We're glad to inform you that we have completed the 2 Redemption pages. See the links below:

👉https://mayohardware.com.au/char-griller-redemption/
👉https://mayohardware.com.au/cozze-redemption/

Just a few notes:
  • Since the banner images get pixelated wihen we use them on the page, our team have revised it to still show on the pages. (see here for Cozze and Char-Griller)
  • Recipient email is set as the default. Feel free to let us know who should receive the answers to the form.
  • Store Purchased is set as a normal field since we do not have the list yet.

Looking forward to your feedback very soon.

Hi Joy, Thanks for the update!
  • For the Char-Griller redemptions page, please set the URL as /char-griller-redemption/
  • For the Cozze redemptions page, please set the URL as /cozze-redemption/
Thanks Bonnie Sudirwan Marketing Communications Manager bsudirwan@mayohardware.com.au http://www.mayohardware.com.au/ 0408 331 966 Customer Service: 1300 360 211 CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This e-mail message, including any attachments, is for the sole use of the intended recipient(s) and may contain confidential and privileged information or otherwise be protected by law. (Time: 15mins) Admin time

Hi Bonnie,

Hope you are having a great Monday!

We appreciate you for sending us these details.

  1. Create 2x Redemption pages with the following info:
    1. Char-Griller Father's Day Promotion
      1. Promo banner at the top of the page
      2. Redemption form:
        • Full name
        • Delivery Details
        • Char-Griller: Model Purchased (drop down menu) - CG1733, CG3070
        • Store Purchased (full list TBC)
        • Tick box for the Terms & Conditions
    2. Cozze Father's Day Promotion
      1. Promo banner at the top of the page
      2. Redemption form:
        • Full name
        • Delivery Details
        • Cozze: Model Purchased (drop down menu) - CZ90552, CZ90556
        • Store Purchased (full list TBC)
        • Tick box for the Terms & Conditions

It is now forwarded and being worked on by our team. Also, please let us know if you have a preferred URL for these 2 pages or if we missed anything.

Furthermore, we’ll be sure to keep you posted as things move along.
